MS MCQs

    Describe the information protection and governance capabilities of Microsoft 365

    »

    1. What type of policy can be used to identify, monitor, and automatically protect sensitive information across Office 365?

      Alert Policies

      Data Loss Prevention policies

      Retention policies


    2. How does Microsoft’s 365 records management solution help organization meet their regulatory and legal obligations?

      Encrypting confidential information

      Managing inactive mailboxes

      Helping organizations be more efficient by disposing of documents and data that are no longer required.


    3. What is the purpose of applying sensitivity labels to your data?

      To identify which folder data should be stored in

      To enforce data protection policies

      To determine how long the data should be retained


    4. What is the main benefit of Azure Information Protection?

      Data classification labels are identifiable regardless of where the data is stored

      Adding sections to Word documents

      Improves storage efficiency
